#summary Camera Calibration Toolbox required.
#labels Phase-Deploy,Phase-Requirements

= Installation =

The [http://www.vision.caltech.edu/bouguetj/calib_doc/index.html "Camera Calibration Toolbox"] of J.-Y. Bouguet must be installed first since our toolbox uses functions and variables from it. 

1. Download Bouguet's Toolbox.
2. Configure the Set Path of Matlab.
